section.title: Description
section.para: A link type control for switching between togglePanel facets. Target Panel is specified with "for" attribute. It can be located inside or outside the togglePanel. As the result of switching between facets previous facet is hidden and another one (specified with "switchToState" or panel "stateOrder" attributes) is shown.

itemizedlist.listitem: Can be located anywhere in a page layout

Switching is provided in the three modes
Server Client Ajax
